means: 布尔，乔治((1815-1864) 英国数学家和逻辑学家，建立了一种符号逻辑的演算法)

sentence.Network_en: Pertaining to the processes used in the algebra formulated by George Boole.
sentence.Network_cn: 指乔治·布尔提出的代数运算法则.

sentence.Network_en: George Boole was an English mathematician who helped establish the field of mathematics called symbolic logic.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔治布尔是一名曾帮助建立数学邻域中逻辑符号的英国数学家.

means.word_mean: 1. English mathematician; creator of Boolean algebra (1815-1864)
1. of or relating to George Boole or his logic;

auth_sentence.content: George Boole did not invent the bivalent logic gates, but rather discovered them.
